CustomField.description: Accrual To Date - If the user selects "Accrual To Date" on the contract, it would mean that the interest amount that would get posted on an IPD would be equal to the amount accrued till the previous date. Accrual Through Date - If the user selects "Accrual Through Date" on the contract, it would mean that that the interest amount that would get posted on an IPD would be equal to the amount accrued till that date.
CustomField.label: Accrual Type
